channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: SafeLinks Protection for Links Generated by M365 Copilot Chat and Office Apps
item.description: The world is experiencing rapid changes, with artificial intelligence (AI) significantly transforming businesses and lifestyles. Additionally, it is impacting cybersecurity, as attackers leverage AI to refine their techniques. Microsoft is committed to ensuring that its AI-powered tools are secure and reliable for business applications. The security of AI remains a primary focus. M365 Copilot Chat Copilot serves as the user interface for AI, beginning with Copilot Chat. It is the chat experience utilized daily, powered by extensive knowledge from the web and designed to ensure safety and secur...
